alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 7:54AM CDT until May 29 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR EASTERN MARSHALL...CENTRAL BELTRAMI...SOUTH CENTRAL LAKE OF THE WOODS AND NORTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 753 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Espelie to near Ebro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carmel, Clearbrook, Jelle, Leonard, Fourtown, Thorhult and Malcolm. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Marshall
